summary: Implemented safe, allowlisted video embedding by extending token-based URL parsing to emit video tokens for YouTube/Vimeo and rendering them via a responsive iframe component inside LinkifiedText. Non-video URLs remain standard external links. CommunityBoardPage usage is asserted via a summary file, but actual code changes for CommunityBoardPage/PostComments rendering are not fully visible in the provided diff summary (PostComments is truncated).

missing_requirements.requirement: Apply video-embed rendering consistently anywhere the app currently uses LinkifiedText to render user-generated text (including CommunityBoardPage post title/body and PostComments comment content).
missing_requirements.reason: LinkifiedText now supports video tokens, and PostComments imports LinkifiedText, but the diff for PostComments is truncated and no concrete diff for CommunityBoardPage is shownâ€”so consistent application to post titles/bodies and comment content cannot be fully verified from the provided diff summary alone.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (claims CommunityBoardPage now renders via LinkifiedText, but no actual code diff shown)

hallucinated_features.description: Added/updated project tracking metadata (project_state.json new_feature_requests entries) unrelated to the UI video-embed requirements.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not request adding or modifying project_state.json or introducing AR-* tracking entries.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated frontend-file-summaries.txt with broad app feature descriptions beyond the requested video-embed change.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asks for video embeds in LinkifiedText usage; modifying a repository-wide summary file (and including unrelated feature claims) is not requested.
